name: TitaniumModule
overview:
TitaniumModule.com is as social marketplace dedicated to the world of programmers who use the Titanium Appcelerator SDK - software development kit.

The site’s goal is to create a modern sales system of templates and modules for applications through which any programmer can put up for sale its products deriving a portion of the purchase price.

The system vocation is highly “social” in the sense that we aim to create a community not only focused on the market, but also the exchange of information about Appcelerator Titanium, with a continuous flow of from top to bottom and from bottom to top.

We also look forward to create a meeting place between companies and programmers to facilitate the intersection of demand and supply of commercial applications developed with Titanium Appcelerator.
